OOC:  btw, both Shard and Jynx have a neutral energy signature. 

> "We are=
 the Predicons and I am Myrmidon!" As he spoke he kicked a
burnt out sweep =
as he stepped closer to Shard, "Who in blazes are you?!"


Shard recognized=
 the Predacon reaction immediately - one that mirrored
his own with hostili=
ty and show of power.  They were both similar in
height and build, Shard on=
ly being an inch or two shy of Myrmidon. 

For a few seconds, Shard just gl=
ared at him, as if to show that he
couldn't be intimidated or forced into a=
nswering if he didn't want to.

"Shard," he said. "I awoke from a stasis po=
d in the forrest and saw
the battle.  Now that it's over, I want some answe=
rs.  Specifically
about what factions are here and who's on whose side."  H=
e glanced
over his shoulder in the direction of the Maximals.  "I detect
Ma=
ximals in the area, but they appeared to be fighting on your side."

As he =
finished, his glare shifted back to Myrmidon, his tone picking
up an accusa=
tory edge.
